lines.sourceText: Can help us to clean the Hall?
lines.sourceEnText: Can help us to clean the Hall?

lines.sourceText: Buy the ingredients for the recipe.
lines.sourceEnText: Buy the ingredients for the recipe.

lines.sourceText: Well done! You matched all the ingredients.
lines.sourceEnText: Well done! You matched all the ingredients.

lines.sourceText: Please now go inside the Old Town Hall...
lines.sourceEnText: Please now go inside the Old Town Hall...

lines.sourceText: Zlotys have different sizes for each value.
lines.sourceEnText: Zlotys have different sizes for each value.

lines.sourceText: Dzień dobry! I am a COOK of typical polish recipes.
lines.sourceEnText: Dzień dobry! I am a COOK of typical polish recipes.

lines.sourceText: I use both cow milk and goat milk.
lines.sourceEnText: I use both cow milk and goat milk.

lines.sourceText: A greengrocer sells fruits and veggies.
lines.sourceEnText: A greengrocer sells fruits and veggies.

lines.sourceText: When you talk to people, remember your manners!
lines.sourceEnText: When you talk to people, remember your manners!

lines.sourceText: The market has the best produce.
lines.sourceEnText: The market has the best produce.

lines.sourceText: I want to enter the Old Town Hall.
lines.sourceEnText: I want to enter the Old Town Hall.

lines.sourceText: Good morning! I'm a beekeeper and I sell honey.
lines.sourceEnText: Good morning! I'm a beekeeper and I sell honey.

lines.sourceText: I put your items in the table. Thank you!
lines.sourceEnText: I put your items in the table. Thank you!

lines.sourceText: But that big blue dog made a mess in the hall.
lines.sourceEnText: But that big blue dog made a mess in the hall.

lines.sourceText: Try talking to the other vendors too.
lines.sourceEnText: Try talking to the other vendors too.

lines.sourceText: Please, come in! There is someone waiting for you.
lines.sourceEnText: Please, come in! There is someone waiting for you.

lines.sourceText: Thank you for cleaning up! Now we can start the Pierogi Festival!
lines.sourceEnText: Thank you for cleaning up! Now we can start the Pierogi Festival!

lines.sourceText: I can prepare for you our famous GINGERBREAD
lines.sourceEnText: I can prepare for you our famous GINGERBREAD

lines.sourceText: We are in TORUŃ, home of Poland's legendary GINGERBREAD!
lines.sourceEnText: We are in TORUŃ, home of Poland's legendary GINGERBREAD!

lines.sourceText: Well done! Go back to the chef.
lines.sourceEnText: Well done! Go back to the chef.

lines.sourceText: We say "Dzień dobry" to greet someone
lines.sourceEnText: We say "Dzień dobry" to greet someone

lines.sourceText: The Old Town Hall is closed to visitors.
lines.sourceEnText: The Old Town Hall is closed to visitors.

lines.sourceText: Would you like to try making a GINGERBREAD?
lines.sourceEnText: Would you like to try making a GINGERBREAD?

lines.sourceText: Hi! I sell EGGS. I am an egg vendor.
lines.sourceEnText: Hi! I sell EGGS. I am an egg vendor.

lines.sourceText: Hi. We want to open the Pierogi Festival
lines.sourceEnText: Hi. We want to open the Pierogi Festival

lines.sourceText: It's our traditional dish made of dough filled with various ingredients.
lines.sourceEnText: It's our traditional dish made of dough filled with various ingredients.

lines.sourceText: Hi! I sell cheese and butter. I am a cheesemonger.
lines.sourceEnText: Hi! I sell cheese and butter. I am a cheesemonger.

lines.sourceText: All of my products come from my beehives!
lines.sourceEnText: All of my products come from my beehives!

lines.sourceText: A cheesemonger sells cheese and milk.
lines.sourceEnText: A cheesemonger sells cheese and milk.

lines.sourceText: Now we can bake TORUŃ GINGERBREAD!
lines.sourceEnText: Now we can bake TORUŃ GINGERBREAD!

lines.sourceText: I need to buy some fresh ingredients.
lines.sourceEnText: I need to buy some fresh ingredients.

lines.sourceText: And go to the MARKET TRADERS
lines.sourceEnText: And go to the MARKET TRADERS

lines.sourceText: A spice vendor sells spices and herbs.
lines.sourceEnText: A spice vendor sells spices and herbs.

lines.sourceText: Visit all the VENDORS in the MARKET.
lines.sourceEnText: Visit all the VENDORS in the MARKET.

lines.sourceText: there is a surprise waiting for you!
lines.sourceEnText: there is a surprise waiting for you!

lines.sourceText: Match GINGERBREAD parts to their seller.
lines.sourceEnText: Match GINGERBREAD parts to their seller.

lines.sourceText: And take the ingredients you buy.
lines.sourceEnText: And take the ingredients you buy.

lines.sourceText: I saw that big blue dog go up the stairs!
lines.sourceEnText: I saw that big blue dog go up the stairs!

lines.sourceText: Now I can cook the GINGERBREAD!
lines.sourceEnText: Now I can cook the GINGERBREAD!

lines.sourceText: I turned on the elevator for you.
lines.sourceEnText: I turned on the elevator for you.

lines.sourceText: Hi! I sell spices. I am a spice vendor.
lines.sourceEnText: Hi! I sell spices. I am a spice vendor.

lines.sourceText: I can't wait to cook a delicious meal!
lines.sourceEnText: I can't wait to cook a delicious meal!

lines.sourceText: Hello! I am a grocer. I sell many kinds of food.
lines.sourceEnText: Hello! I am a grocer. I sell many kinds of food.

lines.sourceText: Do you want to play again?
lines.sourceEnText: Do you want to play again?

lines.sourceText: What do you want to buy?
lines.sourceEnText: What do you want to buy?
